password: Password should include at least 1 uppercase, 1 digit and 1 special character
password-min: Password should be at least {{min}} characters
password-max: Password should be at most {{max}} characters
field-too-short: Field should be at least {{min}} symbols
select-role: At least one checkbox should be checked
terms-of-use: Please accept the Terms and Conditions
agree-with-newsletter-campaign: I agree to receive news about this campaign and news by Podkrepi.bg *
informed-agree-with: I understand and I agree to the
unique-field-violation: The field `{1}` with this value already exists in the platform.
help-us-improve: I agree to be contacted to help improve the platform.
